backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing blog, user email, and access control logic with admin allowlist and profile queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten map of frontend file paths to short summaries used as reference metadata.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering local/mainnet steps and instructions for updating domain and DNS settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark modes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app with default title, meta tags, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, layout, theme, query client, and marketing/admin pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, rendering login, denial, or child content accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty placeholder component for a custom cursor.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Handles a student enquiry form with validation and generates WhatsApp, SMS, and email follow‑up actions after submission.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Manages a teacher application form with multi‑select fields and sends WhatsApp, SMS, and email options after submission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Implements a contact form with validation, simulated submission, and a thank‑you confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Renders a marketing footer with branding, navigation links, and contact actions including WhatsApp and email.
Responsive marketing header with navigation links, logo handling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Contact section offering WhatsApp, call, SMS, and email options using site contact info.
FAQ section rendering a list of expandable questions and answers from site content.
Hero banner with headline, CTAs for student and teacher forms, feature highlights, and a hero image.
Four-step process section explaining how the tutoring service works with icons and descriptions.
Services grid showcasing tutoring subjects with icons, titles, and brief descriptions.
Testimonials section displaying student feedback with ratings and author info.
Stats section highlighting experience, student count, and teacher count with icons.
Value proposition grid outlining key benefits like expert tutors, personalization, flexibility, and results.
frontend/src/config/publicDomain.ts: Provides functions to resolve the app's public domain and build full URLs using environment variables or fallbacks.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Defines the site name and helpers for generating page titles and accessing branding info.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Contains structured terms and conditions content using the site name for dynamic insertion.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Provides marketing copy including hero text, value propositions, services, steps, and testimonials.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Stores contact info, social links, form options, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs for site display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty placeholder file for a custom cursor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook for setting page title and meta description based on provided options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating blog data, user profiles, and admin status via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with global typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp, SMS, phone, and email links along with message builders for student and teacher forms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blogs using React Query mutations and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Admin setup flow handling email registration, admin token submission, and identity-based admin verification.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with loading states and fallback when unpublished or missing.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays a list of published blog posts with loading skeletons and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email contact options using card-based UI and helper link utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage composed of multiple marketing sections with metadata setup.
Implements a standalone marketing landing page with manual meta tag setup and multiple sections.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Shows a configurable setup checklist detailing site configuration items and their statuses.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form with page metadata and a centered layout.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Displays the teacher registration form with metadata and structured layout.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders terms and conditions content dynamically from legalContent with page metadata.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method for access control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Standalone landing page HTML with domain-config JS for setting logos and tracking links, plus layout for navigation and hero sections.
Documentation for a standalone non-React landing page detailing files and usage instructions.
Provides editable content data for the standalone page, including hero text, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQs.
Defines all styling for the standalone landing page, including layout, typography, color variables, components, and responsive behavior.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme settings, animations, colors, and plugins for the main frontend app.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and domain-change requirements for the application.
